I might remember it incorrectly, but I feel like most scenes went something like this:
Black haired girl: Something something sexual
*laughter*
Blonde girl: I used to be rich once, I don't know how these things work
Black haired girl: something something edgy and dark
*laughter*
Magical negro: I am just a folksy elderly black man, something something cool and charming
*laughter*
Asian dude: I am angry at you for some reason
Black haired girl: You're so short, hahahah
*laughter*
Offensive Eastern European stereotype guy: Hey sexy lady, you want the fuck?
*laughter*
Black haired and blonde girl: Oh you
End of scene

The magical negro and the hairy and perverted eastern European guy too, the show was just riddled with extremely outdated and offensive stereotypes, the only thing lacking was a really flamboyant gay guy who is always there with great fashion and life advice and a no-nonsense sassy black woman who tells it like it is.
